Original title: Inside Llewyn Davis
Year: 2013
Duration: 105 min.
Country: United States
Director: Joel Coen, Ethan Coen
Screenplay: Joel Coen, Ethan Coen
Music: Various
Photo: Bruno Delbonnel
Cast: Oscar Isaac, Carey Mulligan, John Goodman , Ethan Phillips, Garrett Hedlund, Justin Timberlake, Max Casella, F. Murray Abraham , Jeanine Serralles, Stark Sands, Jerry Grayson, Robin Bartlett, Adam Driver
Studio: StudioCanal / Scott Rudin Productions / Mike Zoss Productions
Genre: Comedy | Drama . Music . Road Movie. 60s. Gatos
Official Website: http://www.insidellewyndavis.com

Synopsis:
---------
New York, 1961. Llewyn Davis (Oscar Isaac) is a young folk singer who lives badly in Greenwich Village. With his guitar in tow, still homeless and with little money during an icy winter, struggle to make a living as a musician. Survive singing in small booths, but above all , with the help of some friends who lend their couch to spend the cold nights. Suddenly, she travels to Chicago to audition for the music mogul Bud Grossman.

Awards:
-------
2013: Academy Awards: 2 nominations, Best Cinematography and Best Sound
2013: Golden Globes: 3 nominations, best picture, actor and song
2013: Cannes Film Festival: Grand Prize of the Jury
2013: BAFTA Awards: 3 nominations, including Best Cinematography
2013: Critics Choice: 4 nominations, including Best Picture
2013: Gotham Awards: Best Picture. 2 nominations
2013: National Board of Review (NBR): Top 10, Best Screenplay and photography
2013: American Film Institute: Top 10 - Best Films of the Year
2013: Critics Circle New York: Best Cinematography
2013: Independent Spirit Awards: 3 nominations, including Best Picture
2013: Satellite Awards: 6 nominations, including best picture and director
